home.title: Where football brings people together
home.desc: Born from a passion for the beautiful game, Ballie Live is the platform for everyone who doesn’t just want to watch football — but truly experience it. Whether you’re at home, in the pub with friends, or on the go, Ballie Live brings fans, clubs, and venues together in one app. Easily find where your favourite club is playing live, follow matches in real time, and discover places where football lives. Ballie Live connects people through their love of the game and brings the energy of the pitch straight to your screen — anytime, anywhere.

map.title: FootballMaps – Find where football lives
map.desc: With FootballMaps from Ballie Live, you always know where the match is on. Discover cafés, bars, and sports venues near you that show live football — from local derbies to international clashes. See which matches are playing, read reviews, check the atmosphere, and choose the spot where you want to watch. Whether you’re cheering with friends in a packed pub or watching quietly at the bar — FootballMaps shows you the way. Are you a bar, café, or venue owner? Sign up for free with Ballie Live For Business and let fans find your location through FootballMaps. Turn every match into a full house. Ballie Live connects fans, places, and football — all in one app.

card.blurb: Find nearby cafés, bars, and venues showing live football. See what’s playing, check reviews and atmosphere, and choose your perfect spot to watch with FootballMaps by Ballie Live.

business.heading: Ballie For Business – Where football fills your venue
business.desc: Where the passion for football begins, Ballie Live brings people together — at your place. With a free Ballie Live Business account, your café, bar, or sports venue becomes visible to thousands of football fans looking for the perfect spot to celebrate the game together. Show which matches you’re broadcasting — Ballie Live takes care of the rest. Every match night becomes a full house. Ballie Live connects your venue with the emotion and energy of football.
